text: Lili Ilse Elvenes (born Einar Magnus Andreas Wegener; 28 December 1882 – 13 September 1931), better known as Lili Elbe, was a Danish painter and transgender woman. She was among the early recipients of sex reassignment surgery.Hirschfeld, Magnus. Chirurgische Eingriffe bei Anomalien des Sexuallebens: Therapie der Gegenwart, pp. 67, 451–455 Elbe died of cardiac arrest caused by a uterus transplant surgery at the age of 48. On 28 December 2022, Google Doodle celebrated Lili Elbe's 140th birthday.Lili Elbe's 14oth birthday ==Related pages== *List of Danish painters ==References== Category:1882 births Category:1931 deaths Category:Danish painters Category:Transgender women Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest
title: Lili Elbe
